Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Lipid Metabolism Disorders/Lipomatosis/Adiposis Dolorosa
Record.Description: A rare disease characterized by multiple tumor-like fatty deposits that press on nerves in various sites causing pain and weakness. Often these lipoma-like structures are located on the trunk and limbs but sparing the face and hands.
